title._content: [Two unidentified soldiers with Spencer carbines, 1860 sabers, and Colt Army revolvers] (LOC)

description._content: [Two unidentified soldiers with Spencer carbines, 1860 sabers, and Colt Army revolvers] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.2 x 8.1 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Rinhart, no. 257. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Military uniforms--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
